snippet.title: Drill Dozer - Shifting 101 (Nintendo Flash Game)
snippet.description:
Drill Dozer - Shifting 101 (Nintendo Flash Game).

This Nintendo Flash Game is a single challenge game about Drill Dozer.

Nintendo Flash Games Playlist: https://bit.ly/2TPFMvF

Subscribe: https://goo.gl/c7wnTM

Nintendo Flash Games are short little experiences Nintendo put out to promote their actually full games primarily during the GameCube and Wii era. These games are not typically still available to be played through official Nintendo websites. However, thanks to some savvy fans and especially SKELUX, a number of these games have been preserved unofficially. Whether or not Nintendo fully removes these games fully online, hopefully these videos can serve as a preservation of them. In total, I will play about 35 of these old games.

Play them yourself: http://skelux.net/flash.php
SKELUX’s Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/Skelux/featured
SKELUX’s Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QdR0wrV4jiY

Check out my social media pages!

IGN Profile: http://people.ign.com/andruidus
Twitter: https://twitter.com/andruidus713
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/713andrew/
Instagram #2: https://www.instagram.com/andruidus/
Blog: http://andruidus.blogspot.com
Other Channel: https://goo.gl/xnUVVS
